commits.message: security(CodeScribe): Refactor to modular architecture and enhance security with comprehensive analysis
test(test)!: COD-20: Update 11 files (test, docs, code, config)

vulnerabilities.message: Use of eval() can lead to code injection

ai.title: feat: Enhance CodeScribe with advanced linear workflow and improved commit message handling
ai.body:
This PR introduces a significant enhancement to CodeScribe, focusing on two key areas:

1. **Advanced Linear Workflow:**  A completely new linear workflow has been implemented, providing a more streamlined and efficient way to manage code changes. This includes a substantial overhaul of the internal architecture to support this new functionality.  This new workflow is thoroughly documented in `docs/ENHANCED_LINEAR_WORKFLOW.md`.

2. **Improved Commit Message Handling:** The process of creating commit messages has been significantly improved with enhanced templates and better guidance.  This includes the addition of new commit message templates, and improved AI-powered commit message analysis to ensure consistency and clarity. Details can be found in `docs/ENHANCED_COMMIT_MESSAGES.md`.

This release also includes:

* Extensive documentation updates across various documentation files (`docs/*`) to reflect the changes.
* New test cases (`test-*`) to ensure the stability and functionality of the new features.
* A new `src/context/ContextAnalyzer.js` and updated `src/ai/AIAnalysisEngine.js` significantly enhanced AI capabilities.
* Removal of the deprecated `vellum_server.js`

The new features have been thoroughly tested, but please test thoroughly in your environments and report any issues.

**Affected files:**
This PR involves substantial changes across multiple modules, including core workflow logic, AI integration, documentation, and testing.  A comprehensive list of changes is available in the diff.
ai.summary: This release significantly enhances CodeScribe's linear workflow and commit message handling, improving developer efficiency and code quality.

commit.message: security(CodeScribe): Enhanced commit workflows and security improvements (risk level: high)
commit.author: Mohammed Elshrief <111318013+ManagementMO@users.noreply.github.com>
